response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its worth to you, I propose we discuss a mutually beneficial price. My initial offer for this exceptional product is $14,000. I am open to negotiation to ensure both parties are satisfied. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 14000}
